content: to capture both rings of stitches when looking at the back next place 1 fpdc around the two fpdc of the previous round then 1 double_crochet before the popcorn you ll have 1 double_crochet 1 fpdc 1 double_crochet place 1 fpdc around the back of the popcorn * 1 double_crochet in the space between the fpdc and the popcorn 1 fpdc around the set of two fpdc 1 double_crochet before the popcorn 1 fpdc around the back of the popcorn repeat from * until the end of the round slip_stitch into the first double_crochet to close the round round 7 change to white chain 2 does not count place * 1 tc into the stitch you slip stitched into 1 tc in the next 2 sts 1 double_crochet in the next 2 sts 1 half_double_crochet in the next st 1 single_crochet in the next 4 sts 1 half_double_crochet in the next 1 double_crochet in the next 2 sts 1 tc in the next 3 sts chain 2 repeat from * three more times use a half_double_crochet join to the top of the first st to join the round round 8 still with white chain 1 does not count * 1 single_crochet in each stitch until the corner in corner place 1 single_crochet chain 2 1 single_crochet repeat from * until the end of the round slip_stitch into first st to close the round round 9 repeat round 8 tie off and sew in your ends video tutorial available on youtube @juantheyarnaddict please like/share/subscribe this pattern is property of juan the yarn addict owner of jtya designs llc all rights reserved this design the pattern and the images are property of juan the yarn addict you may use this pattern for personal non-commercial use only sales of the finished product are permitted with credit given to juan the yarn addict no part of this document may be reproduced altered distributed or otherwise shared in any form or by any other means
